# Ecopages Documentation
> Ecopages is a static site generator written in TypeScript.

## Getting Started
- [Introduction](https://ecopages.app/docs/getting-started/introduction)
- [Installation](https://ecopages.app/docs/getting-started/installation)
- [Configuration](https://ecopages.app/docs/getting-started/configuration)

## Core
- [Concepts](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/concepts)
- [Architecture](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/architecture)
- [Pages](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/pages)
- [Layouts](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/layouts)
- [Includes](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/includes)
- [Components](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/components)
- [Routing](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/routing)
- [Data Fetching](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/data-fetching)
- [HMR](https://ecopages.app/docs/core/hmr)

## Server
- [Server API](https://ecopages.app/docs/server/server-api)
- [API Handlers](https://ecopages.app/docs/server/api-handlers)
- [Explicit Routing](https://ecopages.app/docs/server/explicit-routing)
- [Caching](https://ecopages.app/docs/server/caching)

## Ecosystem
- [Packages](https://ecopages.app/docs/ecosystem/packages)
- [File System](https://ecopages.app/docs/ecosystem/file-system)
- [Radiant](https://ecopages.app/docs/ecosystem/radiant)
- [React Router](https://ecopages.app/docs/ecosystem/react-router)
- [Browser Router](https://ecopages.app/docs/ecosystem/browser-router)
- [Image Processor](https://ecopages.app/docs/ecosystem/image-processor)
- [PostCSS Processor](https://ecopages.app/docs/ecosystem/postcss-processor)

- [Overview](https://ecopages.app/docs/integrations/overview)

## Plugins
- [Overview](https://ecopages.app/docs/plugins/overview)
